channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Microsoft s’alarme : l’IA chinoise gagne du terrain dans les pays en voie de développement
item.description: L'IA générative chinoise gagne du terrain en dehors des marchés occidentaux. En Afrique, en Asie, les modèles « low cost » et ouverts développés par DeepSeek séduisent les utilisateurs bien davantage que les modèles américains, chers et fermés, d'OpenAI ou de Google. Microsoft tire la sonnette d'alarme.

item.title: DDoS in 2025: what a difference a year makes
item.description: DDoS attacks in 2025 are faster, smarter, and larger, outpacing traditional telecom defenses.

item.title: US government told to patch high-severity Gogs security issue or face attack
item.description: A new bug made its way to CISA's KEV, after being used as a zero-day.

item.title: Anker’s apocalypse-ready home battery system lands to take on Tesla –and it can help you survive for 15 days off-grid
item.description: Anker’s Solix E10 is a modular battery system that can power up your home whatever the weather.

item.title: Revolut déploie une arme fatale pour vous protéger des faux conseillers bancaires
item.description: Une appli bancaire qui vous prévient en plein appel que la personne au bout du fil n’est pas vraiment votre banque : c’est la nouvelle arme de Revolut contre les arnaques par usurpation d’identité, dopées aux deepfakes et à l’IA.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 camera predictions: every rumored lens for all three models
item.description: Between leaks, rumors, and past form, we've come up with predictions for every camera on every Samsung Galaxy S26 model.

item.title: C’est la grande braderie des PC portables gaming et bureautique : le TOP 9 des offres des soldes
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver 2026 ont démarré depuis près d'une semaine et on trouve de très belles offres, notamment du côté des PC portables. Que vous chercher une machine pour faire tourner vos jeux AAA ou d'un laptop ultrafin et performant pour bosser, vous devriez trouver votre bonheur dans cette sélection.

item.title: Sonos Arc Ultra : cette barre de son premium notée 9/10 est à un super prix pour les soldes d’hiver
item.description: La Sonos Arc Ultra, c’est l’arme fatale pour transformer un simple téléviseur en scène Dolby Atmos. En ce moment, elle revient à un super prix pour les soldes 2026 sur Amazon avec une réduction immédiate, faisant passer son prix de 999 euros à 799 euros.

item.title: Ends tomorrow! New customers at Verizon can get $200 with a new line, plus a free iPhone 17 Pro Max and other excellent deals
item.description: Verizon's excellent bonus gift for new customers ends tomorrow - don't hesitate to switch if you want a $200 egift card for cheaper bills.

item.title: AI browsers are creating a new governance gap
item.description: Embedded AI in browsers accelerates work while eroding document control, traceability, and trust.

item.title: reMarkable E Ink tablet bundles are up to $90 off right now
item.description:
E Ink tablet maker reMarkable is running a bundle deal right now that can save you between $80 and $90 when buying a reMarkable 2 along with a Marker stylus and a folio case. The savings vary depending on the bundle you configure, but this can bring your out-the-door cost down to $449 from $529 for the tablet, Marker stylus and polymer weave book folio.
The company also sells a newer stylus called Marker Plus that lets you erase by flipping it around just like a real pencil, but that will cost you an extra $50. If you’ve been eyeing a dedicated writing tablet for work, school or just jotting...

item.title: Godzilla and King Kong Have Monstrous New Company in the ‘Monarch’ Season 2 Teaser
item.description: 'Monarch: Legacy of Monsters' returns to Apple TV on February 27, and it's bringing a terrifying new Titan with it.

item.title: We tried CES 2026’s best and weirdest products, ask us anything!
item.description: We spent last week running to meetings, demos, and the convention floors to see as much as we could at CES 2026. And now that we've (sort of) recovered, it's time to answer any questions you still have. Did we replace Dom with his clone? Did Jen survive a robot falling on her? Is Vee […]

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Wednesday, January 14 (game #948)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Wednesday, January 14 (game #682)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Wednesday, January 14 (game #1451)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: Meta refocuses on AI hardware as metaverse layoffs begin
item.description: As we expected, Meta has begun laying off more than 1,000 employees from its Reality Labs division, which focused on virtual reality and metaverse products, Bloomberg reports. The company will refocus on developing wearables, like its recent batch of AI-powered Ray-Ban smart glasses, according to a memo from CTO Andrew Bosworth.The news isn’t too surprising. Reality Labs has lost more than $70 billion since the beginning of 2021, and while Meta has done a solid job of delivering desirable consumer VR headsets and smart glasses, that business hasn’t been nearly profitable enough to justify the ...

item.title: Internet censorship hit 'half the world’s population' in 2025, Surfshark warns – and 2026 is already looking grim
item.description: Surfshark reports that 4.6 billion people suffered from internet censorship last year. The trend continues in full swing in the first weeks of 2026 across Iran, Pakistan, and Jammu & Kashmir.

item.title: Apple bundles creative apps such as Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro into a single subscription
item.description: Apple has been putting more onus on its services for the past several years — the company makes tens of billions of dollars in revenue from that side of the business, which it claimed had a record year in 2025. Apple is nudging a little more in that direction with a new subscription bundle called Apple Creator Studio.This allows creators to pay a single fee ($13 per month or $129 per year) to use Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, Pixelmator Pro, Motion, Compressor and MainStage. Subscribers will get access to “premium content” in Pages, Keynote and Numbers (as well as in Freeform later this year). Of ...

item.title: Trump asks tech companies to “pay their own way” for their data centers
item.description: Energy costs rose by more than 5% on average between 2024 and 2025 – tackling data centers is the key, says Trump.

item.title: This Samsung 1TB T7 is the best value external SSD I have seen in weeks — at just $99, save a whopping $60
item.description: Samsung’s 1TB T7 portable SSD falls to $99, offering fast USB-C storage for less.

item.title: Microsoft Has a Plan to Keep Its Data Centers From Raising Your Electric Bill
item.description: In response to a growing backlash, Microsoft said it would take steps to ensure that data centers don't raise utility bills in surrounding areas and address other public concerns.

item.title: Final Cut, Logic Pro et Pixelmator Pro : Apple regroupe ses logiciels créatifs dans un abonnement à 12,99 €
item.description: Apple lance un nouvel abonnement tout compris pour ses utilisateurs les plus créatifs. Pour 12,99 € par mois, l'Apple Creator Studio offre l'accès aux versions complètes de Final Cut Pro, de Logic Pro et de Pixelmator Pro sur Mac et sur iPad, sans oublier des « contenus premium » pour Keynote, Pages, Numbers et Freeform.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : jusqu’à 55 % de réduction sur les TV 4K et les vidéoprojecteurs dans cette sélection des 15 meilleurs deals
item.description: Avec les soldes d'hiver, les e-commerçants comptent bien écouler leurs TV 4K et vidéoprojecteurs par palettes ! Les meilleures offres du moment se trouvent dans cette sélection, et on y trouve aussi bien des modèles premium que abordables.

item.title: BitGo IPO: Date, BTGO share price for crypto firm’s closely watched NYSE public debut
item.description: After last year’s successful cryptocurrency-related offerings, BitGo’s IPO is one of the most highly anticipated in 2026. 2025 saw several successful public offerings, especially from companies operating in the AI, cryptocurrency, and fintech spaces. What many on Wall Street are anxious to know is whether the IPO market—and its returns—will accelerate in 2026, or if investors will take a more cautious approach to newly public companies as inflationary pressures, the potential for a weakening economy, and a possible AI bubble weigh heavily on people’s minds....

item.title: Nurses strike in New York City enters day 2, as a severe flu season rages on
item.description: The walkout involves nearly 15,000 nurses over multiple locations, including NewYork-Presbyterian/Columbia and Mount Sinai hospital. Thousands of New York City nurses were set to return to the picket lines Tuesday as their strike targeting some of the city’s leading hospital systems entered its second day.The walkout, which comes during a severe flu season, involved roughly 15,000 nurses spread out across multiple private hospitals, including NewYork-Presbyterian/Columbia, Montefiore Medical Center and Mount Sinai hospital.The affected hospitals have hired droves of temporary nurses to try to ...

item.title: Amazon lance une vague de promotions juste avant la 2e démarque des soldes
item.description: Même sans l’annoncer officiellement, Amazon casse les prix sur une multitude de produits Tech pendant les soldes. Et bonne nouvelle : la 2ᵉ démarque arrive à grands pas ! C’est le moment rêvé pour faire de vraies bonnes affaires et démarrer 2026 du bon pied.

item.title: The MSI Vector A16 just beat the record for the cheapest RTX 5070 gaming laptop we've ever seen
item.description: Get the MSI Vector A16 for $700 off at Walmart and score an RTX 5070 gaming laptop for the lowest price we've ever seen.

item.title: Apple lance Creator Studio : voici ce que contient le nouvel abonnement tout-en-un qui va faire très mal à Adobe
item.description: Vous l'attendiez ? Il est là. Pixelmator Pro débarque enfin sur iPad, mais il n'arrive pas seul. Apple lance Creator Studio, un bundle regroupant ses logiciels pros dopés à l'IA.

item.title: Apple launches ‘Creator Studio’ bundle of apps for $12.99 per month
item.description: The bundle includes access to Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, and Pixelmator Pro on Mac and iPad, as well as Motion, Compressor, and MainStage on Mac.

item.title: « Le dieu IA n’existe pas » : Jensen Huang (Nvidia) veut rassurer, mais…
item.description: Le patron de Nvidia aimerait qu'on arrête avec les discours fatalistes où l'intelligence artificielle dominerait les humains. Sauf que le sien ne rassure pas.

item.title: What Apple and Google’s Gemini deal means for both companies
item.description: For years, Apple and Google have had a will-they-won't-they type of relationship, as far as which AI company Apple would pick to underpin its Siri virtual assistant and give it new AI-fueled personalization and agentic capabilities. Apple has spent the last year or two playing the field, reportedly considering working with OpenAI or Anthropic to […]...

item.title: Alerte sur Mac : un virus codé par l’IA mine des cryptos à votre insu
item.description: Un nouveau malware nommé SimpleStealth vise les Mac. En se faisant passer pour Grok, le malware va installer en douce un mineur de cryptomonnaies sur macOS. Furtif et discret, il fait tout pour passer sous les radars… Les chercheurs ont découvert que le virus a été codé à l'aide de l'IA.

item.title: Anker's Solix E10 battery backup can power your entire house in a blackout
item.description: Anker is going up against Tesla in the home battery backup segment with Solix E10 that promises "whole-home backup" at an affordable price. The system delivers enough power to handle heavy-duty air conditioners and other high-power appliances in the event of a blackout. It also claims that the E10 supports DIY-friendly installation thanks to the stackable, plug-and-play design. Each Anker Solix E10 unit can deliver up to 37.2kW of surge power and stacking two boosts that to 66kW. It also comes with a "turbo output" mode that can output 10kW per unit for 90 minutes maximum. That level of power...

item.title: Boots Riley’s Post-Apocalyptic ‘Simpsons’ Stage Show Is Becoming a Movie
item.description: Plus, could 'Man of Tomorrow' introduce another major DC hero to the DCU?

item.title: « Une erreur s’est produite » : X (Twitter) est victime d’une panne mondiale
item.description: Le réseau social X affiche un message d'erreur. De nombreux internautes signalent une panne

item.title: Avengers: Doomsday trailer 4 heralds a team-up between Wakanda and The Fantastic Four — and it could be the final Marvel movie teaser we see for a while
item.description: The fourth teaser for Avengers: Doomsday has been revealed, and it shows something fans have longed to see in the MCU.

item.title: Meilleures chaises gamer : quel fauteuil de gaming choisir en 2026 ?
item.description: Avoir une bonne chaise gaming est indispensable quand on passe des heures devant son PC gaming. Voici nos recommandations des meilleurs fauteuils gamer que nous avons pu tester, pour jouer dans des conditions optimales.

item.title: CES 2026: The year AI got serious
item.description: What changed was the subtext. AI stopped feeling experimental and started feeling infrastructural. By now, the headlines almost write themselves: humanoid robots everywhere, AI in everything. Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026 didn’t disrupt that narrative—it confirmed it.

item.title: 'We held off for as long as we could': Framework gives stark warning about 'years' of RAM misery as it hikes prices on desktop PC
item.description: If you wanted some better news about the ongoing RAM pricing crisis, you won't find it here.

item.title: Mais c’est quoi ce SUV Renault Filante ? Une base chinoise, une production coréenne et un logo français
item.description: Regardez bien les photos, car vous ne la croiserez probablement jamais sur l'A6. La Renault Filante est officielle. Sous ses airs de "super Rafale", ce SUV de segment E cache une réalité industrielle implacable : une plateforme Geely, une usine à Busan et une stratégie qui ignore délibérément l'Europe de l'Ouest.

item.title: ExpressVPN just dropped a huge MacOS update — here's the 5 things I'm most excited about
item.description: Split tunneling is the headline, but there's much more to look out for

item.title: Top bankers from around the world react to Fed Chair Powell’s DOJ battle with Trump
item.description: A statement signed by 9 heads of central banks included support for Jerome Powell from Sweden, Australia, and Brazil. Central bankers from around the world said Tuesday they “stand in full solidarity” with U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, after President Donald Trump dramatically escalated his confrontation with the Fed with the Justice Department investigating and threatening criminal charges.Powell “has served with integrity, focused on his mandate and an unwavering commitment to the public interest,” read the statement signed by nine national central bank heads including European C...

item.title: Prix des PC portables : l’astuce radicale de HP pour limiter la hausse des tarifs
item.description: Alors que HP réfléchirait à intégrer de la mémoire DRAM chinoise à certains de ses PC portables, la Chine se place en véritable alternative pour compenser la crise que traverse le marché cette année.

item.title: Mises à jour Xiaomi : Orange cède enfin, l’opérateur évoque « un problème de sécurité »
item.description: Il y a deux jours, Orange expliquait que valider une mise à jour prenait du temps. Aujourd'hui, après une fronde massive sur les forums et les réseaux, l'opérateur déploie soudainement la dernière version d'HyperOS sur les Xiaomi 15.

item.title: Ces extensions ont transformé mon expérience de Steam
item.description: Plusieurs extensions pour navigateur permettent de radicalement améliorer l'expérience de Steam et profiter des meilleurs prix.

item.title: Quatix 8 Pro : Garmin dévoile une nouvelle montre avec connexion satellite, mais bien plus utile encore
item.description: Après ses Fenix 8 Pro et Fenix 8 Pro Microled lancées l'an dernier, Garmin a déployé ses dernières technologies connectées vers un nouveau modèle, la Garmin Quatix 8 Pro, destinée aux navigateurs.

item.title: The Disney+ Hulu bundle is on sale for $10 for one month right now
item.description: You have the best chance to save on streaming services during the holiday shopping season, but throughout the year, the occasional deal pops up that's worth considering. Case in point: this new Disney+ deal. New and eligible returning subscribers can sign up for the Disney+ Hulu bundle (with ads) for $10 for one month of access. That's $3 off the usual price of the bundle for one month, and more than 58 percent off if you consider the cost of each service individually (Disney+ at $12 per month and, separately, Hulu also at $12 per month). We'd be remiss if we didn't mention that this isn't qui...

item.title: Betterment confirms data breach, tells customers to beware crypto scam notifications
item.description: A Betterment employee was tricked into sharing login credentials, which were then used to send phishing emails.

item.title: De gros nuages noirs à l’horizon pour le marché du PC
item.description: Un petit miracle avant le saut dans le vide : c'est ainsi que l'on pourrait qualifier le quatrième trimestre 2025 pour les vendeurs de PC. Les livraisons ont augmenté de quasiment 10 % en fin d'année dernière selon IDC, mais 2026 s'annonce extrêmement compliquée.

item.title: The best 55-inch 4K TVs for all budgets, all tested by our experts.
item.description: Don't settle for less than the best 55-inch 4K TVs, with great pictures, upscaling, interfaces, and audio all in one brilliant package.

item.title: The Latest ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Trailer Gives Us an Unlikely Team-Up
item.description: Wakanda welcomes a surprise guest in our latest look at the next 'Avengers' film.

item.title: Tesla launches a seven-seat version of the 2026 Model Y
item.description: Tesla's 2026 Model Y is now available on the company's site and it comes with a new (and old) option: a seven-seat version via a third row. The extra seating costs $2,500 and is only available if you order the Premium All-Wheel-Drive Long Range model. Tesla first teased the option last year via an email to prospective buyers with the promise of "seating for up to seven and enough room for everyone's gear," Electrek reported at the time. The new seats appear to be designed mainly for children as they don't offer much legroom, according to images on Tesla's configurator. Tesla notes that the s...

item.title: Google Messages is getting a big update in 2026 — here are the 3 new WhatsApp-style features to look out for
item.description: This is the year that Google Messages finally gets group chat mentions, and a more advanced long-press menu.

item.title: How Lego’s Smart Brick works
item.description: The most interesting story at this year's CES was just a little tiny bundle of technology. One way to look at Lego's new Smart Brick is as something like a Raspberry Pi, an endlessly remixable gizmo with infinite hacking potential - it can be anything, in the best possible way. Another way to look at […]

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : même les iPhone d’Apple sont en soldes dans cette sélection des 16 meilleures offres
item.description: Si vous attendiez les soldes pour changer de smartphones, vous avez bien fait ! Durant cette période, on trouve de belles offres du côté des Galaxy S de Samsung, des Pixel de Google et appareils Xiaomi, et même des iPhone d'Apple. Découvrez les meilleures offres : il y en a pour tous les budgets.

item.title: Star Wars Outlaws developer Massive Entertainment and Ubisoft Stockholm face layoffs
item.description: We aren't even two weeks into the new year and Ubisoft is already looking to carry out its second round of layoffs in 2026. The company has informed workers at Massive Entertainment and Ubisoft Stockholm of a "proposed organizational restructure" that could affect around 55 roles across its two Swedish studios. Workers at Massive (the developer of The Division series, Star Wars Outlaws and Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora) were offered voluntary buyouts late last year as part of Ubisoft's ongoing cost-cutting efforts."This restructure follows the completion of the Voluntary Leave Program launched ...

item.title: 'All those moments will be lost in time, like tears in rain' — Players bid farewell to Anthem as EA officially shuts down the game's servers for good
item.description: Anthem servers have officially gone offline, making BioWare's 2019 online sci-fi shooter no longer playable, leaving players to share their final farewells.

item.title: Why prediction markets may be bad for your wallet—and your mental health
item.description: The parallels to casinos are drastically obvious. Prediction markets are all the rage right now. Weekly trading volume on prediction platforms just surpassed $2 billion, and apps like Polymarket are being treated as the “next big thing” in consumer finance and entertainment. These platforms are designed to gamify uncertainty by exploiting the same cognitive biases as gambling and day-trading, quietly pushing users toward overspending, emotional volatility, and compulsive checking....

item.title: Zorin OS continue de séduire et passe le cap des 2 millions de téléchargements
item.description: Le système d’exploitation continue de profiter de la fin du support de Windows 10. La distribution Linux a été téléchargée plus de deux millions de fois en à peine trois mois.
